meanings.definition: On the other side of a page.
meanings.sent1: She wrote a secret message overleaf in her notebook.
meanings.sent2: Please continue your drawing on the overleaf page.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf left a tiny drawing overleaf for the next reader to find.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts spilled overleaf, revealing his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The overleaf page held a hidden treasure map, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.sent1: Turn overleaf to see the continuation of the story.
meanings.sent2: The answer to the riddle is written overleaf.
meanings.sent3: The recipe for the delicious cake was overleaf, causing a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams for the future lay just overleaf, waiting to unfold.
meanings.sent5: The overleaf page contained a clue that would lead them to the next adventure.
